title: Introducing: Bienart
body:
Some top quality indie pop songwriting here from Chicago’s Bienart.

Funky, addictive and frustratingly short. Check out Surgeon below, lifted from a debut EP available on [Bandcamp](http://bienart.bandcamp.com/).

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
